mapper.select:
select MEM.MEMBER_SEQ as MEMBER_SEQ , MEM.EMAIL as EMAIL , MEM.NAME as NAME , MEM.PHONE as PHONE , AUTH.AUTHORITY as AUTHORITY , MEM.PASSWORD as PASSWORD from MEMBER MEM INNER JOIN AUTHORITY_REL AUTH_REL ON MEM.MEMBER_SEQ = AUTH_REL.MEMBER_SEQ INNER JOIN AUTHORITY AUTH ON AUTH_REL.ID_AUTHORITY = AUTH.ID_AUTHORITY
and MEM.MEMBER_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ}
